game.name: Devi5e: FEARS
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Devi5e: Fears is a psychological horror game. You play as Diti who is now exploring a convenient store where she has to face the fears of someone else's past experiences. Gather answers regarding incidents that took place which were deemed inhuman or even supernatural.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Devi5e: Fears is a psychological horror game. You play as Diti who is now exploring a convenient store where she has to face the fears of someone else's past experiences. Gather answers regarding incidents that took place which were deemed inhuman or even supernatural.
